Articles.Content:
The Panjamdrum was a weapon unlike any other. It was designed during ww2 to go up a beach from the water, hit the German barricade and explode. This made a tank-sized hole in the wall. It did not work as the rockets didn't fire consistently and it fell over all the time.

Your job is to build one in KSP. It must float in water, It must be rocket powered, it must have to side by side wheels attached to a central barrel. Basically it must look like the picture and do the same thing as the description.

As usual No cheat mods

Mods with bombs and weapons are okay because you can strap them on your Panjamdrum.

Informational mods alright too

Alright so here is what you have to do with you monstrosity.

1. Get it into the water facing the KSC peninsula

2.FIRE

3.Report: Did it blow up a building? Did it scare a small dog? Did it return to the waters from hence it came?

Edited July 14, 2017 by Scorpiodude

Welcome to the Forums @Scorpiodude!!

If you would kindly provide some more information about the original Panjamdrum. Something like pictures, or a link where to find those would help a lot.
Can you add your attempt? Because this is a rule for a challenge!

Basically it must look like the pictures

what pictures???

Also I didn't take any screenshots for what I built as it's still in development. I will learn to post images and other things later, as I said I am a newbie.
